text:
One of Scott Disick’s short-lived squeezes had no interest keeping up with the Kardashian crew member’s intense, booze-heavy lifestyle.

Bella Thorne — one of several women who frollicked around Cannes with the self-proclaimed Lord — says she only lasted a day and a half with Disick before she bailed last month.

“I just don’t party hardcore like that and it was way too much for me,” Thorne, 19, told Complex UK. “I was like, ‘Woah, this is not the way I live my life, bruh.'”

Thorne said the reality star is a “really nice, sweet, charming” guy, but said their difference in lifestyles prompted her to book a flight and come home before their second day at the French film festival in late May was over.

Bella Thorne said Scott Disick partied a lot harder than her.

“I don’t drink, and he really drinks a lot,” she continued. “And it just ended up …I just wasn’t down. I was like, ‘I gotta leave.'”

Thorne said she met Disick — who has three kids with ex Kourtney Kardashian — before Cannes at one of the house parties she threw with her sister Dani.

She garnered considerable attention at Cannes when a paparazzi photo emerged showing Disick, 32, with his hand on her breast as they luxuriated poolside, but Thorne insists the snapshot painted a misleading picture.

“Honestly, my nipple came out of my bikini and he tried to fix it for me and it looks like he’s grabbing my boob,” she told Complex. “That’s very nice of you to actually not sit there and stare at my nipple because my boobs are big — they come out of my shirt all the time! You can’t keep those suckers down.”

Disick didn’t miss a beat after Thorne left; he was photographed with his former flame Chloe Bartoli, British model Ella Ross and Justin Bieber’s ex Sofia Richie, 18, after Thorne’s departure.

Despite her early exit, Thorne told Entertainment Tonight that she’s still hanging out with Disick.

Scott Disick and Bella Thorne were spotted at the airport in May, before their trip to Cannes.

“We’re chillin’, we’re friends, we’re cool,” she told ET after returning to Los Angeles. “I literally just saw him.”

Disick, who has attended rehab for substance abuse in the past, stars alongside Kardashian and her famous family on “Keeping Up with the Kardashians.”
title: Bella Thorne says Scott Disick’s partying was too much for her during Cannes fling: ‘He really drinks a lot’

meta_data.description: One of Scott Disick's short-lived squeezes had no interest keeping up with the Kardashian crew member.
